title: Information Exposure Through Query Strings in GET Request
overview: The web application uses the GET method to process requests that contain sensitive information, which can expose that information through the browser&amp;#x27;s history, Referers, web logs, and other sources.
remediation: ::PHASE:Implementation:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:When sensitive information is sent, use of the POST method is recommended (e.g. registration form).::
